p: The novel influenza A/H1N1 outbreak was declared a public health emergency in the USA on 26 April 2009. The NYSDOH implemented its Incident Management System to coordinate the response across all department subject matter leads including but not limited to: epidemiology, laboratories, immunization, planning, logistics, public affairs group, healthcare system management and division of administration. The NYSDOH was also active on the Interagency Taskforce on Influenza Preparedness during the 2009 pandemic.
